FuncDef: The display snmp-agent sys-info command displays system information on an existing SNMP device. The information includes contact information about the system maintenance, the physical location of the device, and the SNMP version. The display snmp-agent sys-info command displays system information on an existing SNMP device. The information includes contact information about the system maintenance, the physical location of the device, and the SNMP version.
CLIs: display snmp-agent sys-info [ contact | location | version ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays contact information on an existing SNMP device.
-

Displays physical location information of an existing SNMP device.
-

Displays the SNMP version running on an existing device.
-

ExtraInfo: To view the contact information about the system maintenance, physical location of the device, and SNMP version, run the display snmp-agent sys-info command.
